Title: Crazy Whitefella Thinking
Writer: Tamara P. Carter (story editor), Nick Cuse (story editor), Damon Lindelof (created by), Damon Lindelof, Tom Perrotta (created by), Tom Spezialy
Actors: Justin Theroux, Amy Brenneman, Christopher Eccleston, Chris Zylka
Plot: With the clock ticking towards the anniversary of the Departure and emboldened by a vision that is either divine prophecy or utter insanity, Kevin Garvey, Sr. wanders the Australian Outback in an effort to save the world from apocalypse.
